name: NHE5 Unit 5: Where is the post office?
name_original: NHE5 Unit 5: Where is the post office?
description:
This map game is best used with Tokyo Shoseki's New Horizon Elementary English (5) Unit 5: Where is the post office?

Target sentences:

Turn left/right.

Go straight for one block.

Go straight for two/three/four blocks.

Turn left/right at the first/second/third corner.

It's on your left/right.
